title: New game mode - Legacy/retro mode
body:
I have always had this in mind and with the change to {{champion:78}} 's kit I decided to put it up on the board.

With more and more champions reworked and items removed, wouldn't it be nice to have a game mode (maybe for a limited time like URF) that allows players to choose the from existing champs, as well  as their pre-reworks (AP{{champion:11}} etc), along with bringing back the removed items (I always liked playing SotD {{champion:4}}  back in the days). Maybe even have the game on the old maps just for the retro-ness.

Just a thought that I felt like sharing, sorry if a similar idea has already been posted.
